Reviews.Title: Great little cameras
Reviews.Author: Installer
Reviews.Content: They work great! Good picture, good night vision. All plastic construction, but it seems like it will be durable. Remember these are indoor only cameras.

ProductInfo.Features:
Four Sharp 1/3 CCD 420TVL Color Indoor Dome Camera Infrared Day / Night Vision
Manual Pan / Tilt for with Wall mount and Celling mount
24 infra-red LEDs see in the dark up to 50-65ft.
Operates in freezing temperatures down to 4°F(-20°C)
One Year Warranty Guaranteed
ProductInfo.Name: CIB CUC8401-4 420TVL indoor CCD Dome IR Day Night Security Camera Sharp Sensor.
